005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
009
010import java.util.Locale;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
014
015/**
016 * An Metaschema model instance representing a grouped set of objects consisting
017 * of heterogeneous object types.
018 */
019public interface IChoiceGroupInstance
020    extends IModelInstanceAbsolute, IContainerModelGrouped {
021
022  /**
023   * The default max-occurs value for a choice group. {@code -1} represents an
024   * unbounded occurance.
025   */
026  int DEFAULT_CHOICE_GROUP_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS = -1;
027
028  /**
029   * The default JSON property value used to identify the specific type of the
030   * object.
031   */
032  @NonNull
033  String DEFAULT_JSON_DISCRIMINATOR_PROPERTY_NAME = "object-type";
034
035  /**
036   * {@inheritDoc}
037   *
038   * @see #DEFAULT_CHOICE_GROUP_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS
039   */
040  @Override
041  default int getMaxOccurs() {
042    return DEFAULT_CHOICE_GROUP_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS;
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Provides the Metaschema model type of "CHOICE".
047   *
048   * @return the model type
049   */
050  @Override
051  default ModelType getModelType() {
052    return ModelType.CHOICE_GROUP;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Get the JSON property to use to discriminate between JSON objects.
057   *
058   * @return the discriminator property
059   * @see #DEFAULT_JSON_DISCRIMINATOR_PROPERTY_NAME
060   */
061  @NonNull
062  String getJsonDiscriminatorProperty();
063
064  @Override
065  default boolean isEffectiveValueWrappedInXml() {
066    return true;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Get the effective name of the JSON key flag, if a JSON key is configured.
071   * <p>
072   * This name is expected to be in the same namespace as the containing model
073   * element (i.e. choice group, assembly, field).
074   *
075   * @return the name of the JSON key flag if configured, or {@code null}
076   *         otherwise
077   */
078  @Nullable
079  String getJsonKeyFlagInstanceName();
080
081  /**
082   * Get the named model instance for the provided choice group item.
083   *
084   * @param item
085   *          the item to get the instance for
086   * @return the named model instance for the provided choice group item
087   */
088  @NonNull
089  default INamedModelInstanceGrouped getItemInstance(@NonNull Object item) {
090    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Method not needed.");
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  default MarkupMultiline getRemarks() {
095    // no remarks
096    return null;
097  }
098
099  @SuppressWarnings("null")
100  @Override
101  default String toCoordinates() {
102    return String.format("%s-instance:%s:%s/%s@%d",
103        getModelType().toString().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
104        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
105        getContainingDefinition().getName(),
106        getGroupAsName(),
107        hashCode());
108  }
109}
